}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *"P/N: 142000001000A REV: 0A" appears to be silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. *"P/N: 142000001005A REV: 0A" is silkscreened on the 2.4 GHz wireless module in the FCC photos. :A label affixed to the module indicates the parent [[Accton]] model is EAP1018FB.
The 70:72:CF OUI used in this entry is per the MAC label affixed to the FCC EUT's board. :It may not be used (or may not be used by the wireless IFs).
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.edge-core.com/ProdDtl.asp?sno=479&ECW7210-L Product page] (Project Only)
==Notes== ===Probable included PSU(s)=== The power supply shown in the FCC photos is an :''Asian Power Devices'' WA-30B12FU.
{{hasPowerSupply |brand = Asian Power Devices |model = WA-30B12FU |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.8 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50-60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=2.5 |output_conn=barrel |e_level=5 |style=large, vertical |countrymanuf = China }}
